resources: • Păp san khhãm pák tãy-Keo Eng = Ngữ-vựng Thái-Việt-Anh = Tai-Vietnamese-English vocabulary. Chính Nhìm, Diêu; Donaldson, Jean. 1970. Tủ sách ngôn-ngữ dân tộc thiểu số Việt Nam. oai:sil.org:30992
• White Thai - Vietnamese - English dictionary and text. Donaldson, Jean. 1961. SIL Language and Culture Archives. oai:sil.org:35749
• White Tai phonology. Donaldson, Jean. 1963. SIL Language and Culture Archives. oai:sil.org:9514
• A preliminary examination of Tay Tac. Donaldson, Jean; Edmondson, Jerold A. 1997. SIL International Publications in Linguistics 124. oai:sil.org:8829

• ONLINETai D?n: a language of Viet Nam. n.a. 2013. SIL International. oai:ethnologue.com:twh

• ONLINEGlottolog 2.6 Resources for Tai Dón. n.a. 2015. Max Planck Institute for the Science of Human History. oai:glottolog.org:taid1250
